name: GTHOI (Get the hell out of my island)
name_original: GTHOI (Get the hell out of my island)
description:
Hi,

This game is about pushing the bad guys out of your island.

To do so, you must pickup the enderpearl around the island by going into them and throw them at the enemy using left click.

If any enemies touches you or if you go into the water, you lose. 

This game start kinda fast so be ready. :)

This game was made by Eric Tran, Frederic Ye, Clement Xu
